DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim of the present study is to study the effect of a brief automated alcohol intervention in University students, and if there is a difference in effect between automated brief interventions delivered by internet (WEB) or Interactive Voice Response (IVR), and to study if there is difference in effect between single and repeated interventions.
DOC.brief_title: Development of IVR and WEB Alcohol Interventions
DOC.criteria: Females scoring 6 and above and males scoring 8 and above on AUDIT. Females scoring 5 and below and males scoring 7 and below on AUDIT
